item.title: Former Fed 'Hawk': Does Indeed Believe Fed Will Cut Rates in September
item.description: August 21st: Former President Bullard of the St. Louis Fed expressed the belief that the Fed will implement rate cuts in September. He also had communication with U.S. Treasury Secretary Yellen regarding the position of the Fed chair. (Xinhua Finance)

item.title: Former Fed Hawk: Current Interest Rates are High, Could Cut by 100 Basis Points by 2026
item.description: August 21st. The former president of the St. Louis Fed, Bullard, stated that the current interest rates are at a relatively high level and there is a possibility of a 100-basis-point cut by 2026. Additionally, the Fed also needs to focus on maintaining the reserve status of the US dollar. (FX168)

item.title: Greeks.Live: Market Sentiment Shows Cautious Bullishness, Traders Believe ETH Has Bottomed Out
item.description: On August 21st, Greek.Live issued its daily market briefing which said, "The community has demonstrated a cautious bullish sentiment. Traders think that ETH has reached the bottom and are waiting for a potential trend reversal. The key attention is on ETH's strong performance compared to BTC. Meanwhile, traders maintain a certain exposure by selling put options and taking profits on call options for the purpose of risk management."

item.title: The probability of a Fed rate cut in September is 79.1%
item.description: On August 21st, based on CME's "FedWatch" tool, the likelihood of the Fed keeping interest rates unchanged in September is 20.9%, and the probability of a 25-basis-point interest rate cut is 79.1%.

item.title: The EU and the US Reach Agreement on Finalizing Trade Deal Joint Statement
item.description: On August 21st, the EU and the US reached a joint statement regarding the finalization of a trade agreement. The EU intends to purchase $750 billion worth of US liquefied natural gas, oil, and nuclear energy products, as well as at least $400 billion worth of US artificial intelligence chips. It was reaffirmed that EU companies will make an additional investment of $600 billion in strategic areas in the US by 2028. (Golden Ten)

item.title: OKB Breaks $200, Hits New All-Time High
item.description: On August 21st, based on HTX market data, OKB exceeded $200. It is currently trading at $203.06 and has a 24-hour increase of 52.57%, reaching a new all-time high.

item.title: Starknet has announced the upcoming launch of Bitcoin Staking functionality.
item.description: On August 21st, as per official channels, Starknet has declared that the SNIP-31 proposal has been officially approved and the Bitcoin staking feature is about to become operational. According to the proposal, the BTC staking weight is set at 0.25, enabling BTC to hold a maximum stake of 25% in the consensus power, with the remaining weight being allocated to STRK.Meanwhile, WBTC, LBTC, tBTC, and SolvBTC have been approved for staking on Starknet, and the governance rules for the approval of new BTC wrapped tokens have also been officially established. The official intention is to launch this feature in the upcoming weeks.

item.title: Reuters: Asia's Wealthy Families Look to Boost Crypto Allocations in Portfolios
item.description: On August 21st, as reported by Reuters, Asian wealthy families and family offices are boosting their cryptocurrency investments. This is driven by optimistic expectations for digital assets, enhanced mainstream acceptance, and favorable regulatory developments in key markets.Wealth managers state that they have witnessed a notable increase in inquiries. There has been a surge in cryptocurrency exchange volumes and strong demand for cryptocurrency funds as high-net-worth Asian investors seek greater market exposure."Within just a few months, we have raised over $100 million, and the feedback from our limited partners has been extremely positive," said Jason Huang, the Founder of NextGen Digital Venture. Here, the limited partners are mainly high-net-worth individuals.The Swiss investment bank UBS mentioned that some overseas Chinese family offices plan to raise their cryptocurrency exposure to approximately 5% of their portfolios.

item.title: OKX will delist margin trading pairs such as CATI/USDT, NMR/USDT.
item.description: August 21st. According to an official announcement, OKX has declared the removal of leverage trading and spot margin trading services for CATI/USDT, NMR/USDT, ICX/USDT, DGB/USDT, MEME/USDT, JST/USDT, and RVN/USDT.

item.title: A new address sold $1.5 million worth of ETH and then went long on ETH with 20x leverage.
item.description: On August 21st. Based on the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a newly established wallet address sold 355.97 ETH and exchanged it for 1.5 million USDC. Then, this user went long on an ETH position with a leverage of 20x and deposited the obtained funds into Hyperliquid.
